sentences.en: a new treatment that could save his life
sentences.cn: 能够挽救他生命的一种新疗法

sentences.en: Always buy a heater with thermostat control to save on running costs.
sentences.cn: 始终购买可调温度的取暖器以节省使用成本。

sentences.en: Dolphins have sometimes been known to save drowning swimmers.
sentences.cn: 据悉海豚有时会救溺水的游泳者。

sentences.en: Don't resort to cheap copies; save up for the real thing.
sentences.cn: 别买廉价的仿冒品，攒点钱买正品吧。

sentences.en: Drain the beans thoroughly and save the stock for soup.
sentences.cn: 将豆角彻底控干，并把滤出的豆汁留下做汤。

sentences.en: Emergency aid could save millions threatened with starvation.
sentences.cn: 紧急援助可以拯救数百万受到饥饿威胁的人。

sentences.en: Every evening in those days the BBC played "God Save The King"
sentences.cn: 那些日子里，英国广播公司每天晚上都会播放《天佑吾王》。

sentences.en: Everyone is being encouraged to save energy.
sentences.cn: 每个人都被鼓励节约能源。

sentences.en: Four rescue plans are vying to save the zoo.
sentences.cn: 4个拯救动物园的方案正争得不可开交。

sentences.en: He managed to save enough to buy a small house.
sentences.cn: 他想办法攒够钱买了一幢小房子。

sentences.en: He'd have done anything to anybody to save his own skin.
sentences.cn: 为了活命，他可以不顾任何人，不择手段。

sentences.en: I'll try to save him the expense of a flight from Perth.
sentences.cn: 我会设法替他省下要从珀斯飞来的机票费用。

sentences.en: Mr Mendes was leading a campaign to save Brazil's rainforest from exploitation.
sentences.cn: 门德斯先生正领导一场运动，以拯救遭到乱砍滥伐的巴西热带雨林。

sentences.en: Psychometric tests can save organizations from grim and costly mistakes.
sentences.cn: 心理测试能够使组织机构避免犯下损失惨重的大错。

sentences.en: Save your breath; you can't dissuade them.
sentences.cn: 别白费劲儿了；你劝阻不了他们的

sentences.en: She was determined to save her marriage.
sentences.cn: 她决心挽救自己的婚姻。

sentences.en: So far, I’ve saved about £500.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止，我已存了大约500英镑。

sentences.en: the campaign to save the rainforests
sentences.cn: 拯救热带雨林的运动

sentences.en: The scanner will save risk and pain for patients.
sentences.cn: 扫描仪将使病人免遭风险和痛苦。

sentences.en: They could not find any way to save money.
sentences.cn: 他们没办法存下钱。

sentences.en: They've begun to hoard food and gaso-line and save their money.
sentences.cn: 他们已经存钱并开始贮藏食物和汽油。

sentences.en: ways to save money on heating bills
sentences.cn: 节省取暖费的种种办法

sentences.en: We have been frantically trying to save her life.
sentences.cn: 我们一直在极力想办法挽救她的生命。

sentences.en: We’ll save a lot of time if we go by car.
sentences.cn: 我们要是开车去，可以节省很多时间。

sentences.en: We’ll save the rest of the food and have it later.
sentences.cn: 我们把剩下的食物留着以后吃。

sentences.en: Winston could not have read the road signs to save his life.
sentences.cn: 温斯顿怎么也学不会看路标。

sentences.en: write it down and &B{save yourself the trouble of} remembering.
sentences.cn: 把它写下来，免得你费心记它。

words.tran_cn: 节约的；挽救的；补偿的；保留的
救助者；节俭的人；节约装置

phrases.tran_cn: 不必白费劲：省去无用的请求或努力
扳回颜面，保住面子；保全面子

phrases.phrase: save someone's skin (或 neck 或 bacon)
phrases.tran_cn: 救某人脱离危险（或困难）
救场，解决问题，排除灾难
别唠叨了；省口气吧；别白费口舌了

trans.tran_en: an action in which a player in a game such as football prevents the other team from scoring

trans.tran_cn: 救助，储蓄，节约，保存，收集，使免受，救(球)
trans.tran_en: to keep money in a bank so that you can use it later, especially when you gradually add more money over a period of time
to keep money in a bank so that you can use it later, especially when you gradually add more money over a period of time

trans.tran_cn: 救助，搭救；储蓄，积攒；节约，节省，免去；保存
trans.tran_en: to keep money in a bank so that you can use it later, especially when you gradually add more money over a period of time
